## Checklist
- [ ] One entry per PR
- [ ] Alphabetical order within section
- [ ] Description is a single sentence and ends with a period
- [ ] Link is stable (official docs/repo where possible)
- [ ] I ran or relied on CI for: awesome-lint, link check, markdownlint
